damage.formula: if (b.isStateAffected(15)) {b.removeState(15); a.addState(4); b.atk * 2.5 - a.def * 2} if (a.isStateAffected(14)) {a.removeState(13); a.removeState(14); a.atk * 20 - b.def * 2} else if (a.isStateAffected(13)) {a.removeState(13); a.addState(14); a.atk * 12 - b.def * 2} else {a.addState(13); a.atk * 4 - b.def * 2}

name: Attack
Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description: Heals 25% of total HP at the cost of 1/3rd Mana
name: Lay on Hands

description:
Does more damage than Fire 1.
Does no damage if the target is not Burn 1.
name: Fire 2
note:
original formula:
300 + a.mat * 2 - b.mdf * 2

new formula:
if (b.isStateAffected(11)) {300 + a.mat * 2 - b.mdf * 2} else {0}

description: Sets off the enemy trap and converts it into heals.
name: Trap Breaker

description:
Lays a trap on an ally. If ally takes physical
damage, the enemy is poisoned.
name: Poison Trap

damage.formula: if (b.isStateAffected(15)) {b.removeState(15); a.addState(4); b.atk * 2.5 - a.def * 2} if (b.isStateAffected(14)) {b.removeState(13); b.removeState(14); a.luk - b.luk + 1 * a.luk / 2 * a.level} else if (b.isStateAffected(13)) {b.removeState(13); b.removeState(14); a.luk - b.luk + 1 * a.luk / 2 * a.level} else {0}

description:
Attempts to break enemy combo. If successful,
does damage depending on combo level. Uses LUK to dmg.
message1: attempts to perform a Combo Breaker!
name: Combo Breaker

description: Brings target back to half health.
name: Phoenix Light

description:
Places a heal trap on an ally. 
If an enemy lands a physical attack, the trap is sprung.
name: Heal Trap

damage.formula: if (b.isStateAffected(15)) {b.removeState(15); a.addState(4); b.atk * 2.5 - a.def * 2} if (b.isStateAffected(14)) {b.removeState(13); b.removeState(14); a.luk - b.luk + 1 * a.luk / 2 * a.level} else if (b.isStateAffected(13)) {b.removeState(13); b.removeState(14); a.luk - b.luk + 1 * a.luk / 2 * a.level} else {0}

description:
Attempts to break enemy combo. If successful,
does damage depending on combo level. Uses LUK to dmg.
message1: attempts to perform a Combo Breaker!
name: Breaker Slash

damage.formula: if (b.isStateAffected(11) || b.isStateAffected(12) || b.isStateAffected(15) || b.isStateAffected(16) || b.isStateAffected(17) || b.isStateAffected(18) || b.isStateAffected(19) || b.isStateAffected(20)) {b.removeState(11); b.removeState(12); b.removeState(15); b.removeState(16); b.removeState(17); b.removeState(18); b.removeState(19); b.removeState(20); b.mp + b.mat} else {0}

description:
Converts all current States into a single heal.
Does not remove combos.
name: Clean State

damage.formula: if (b.isStateAffected(12)) {b.removeState(12); b.removeState(11); 3600 + a.mat * 2 - b.mdf * 2} else if (b.isStateAffected(11)) {b.removeState(11); b.addState(12);1500 + a.mat * 2- b.mdf * 2} else {b.addState(11); 200 + a.mat * 2 - b.mdf * 2}

description:
Sole Fire Combo. Does more fire damage depending on 
burn level.

description: Basic attack but against everyone in the party
name: Raging Cleaver

description:
Cures an ally of their burn status and does damage
to the enemy equal to enemy minus caster's m.atk.
name: Negafire

description:
Rolls two dice and compares them with the user's
LUK stat.
name: Flank

description:
Takes an enemy's magic debuff and applies it to
a heal.
name: Scrub Magic
